project_descr:
The proposed Alternative is to adopt a ground-tested and officially recognized strategy for environmental management in Indigenous
Lands (IL) by Indigenous Peoples (IP) for the effective conservation and sustainable use of forest biodiversity.

outputs.output_title: CATALYZING THE CONTRIBUTION OF INDIGENOUS LANDS TO THE CONSERVATION OF BRAZIL’S FOREST ECOSYSTEMS
outputs.output_descr: CATALYZING THE CONTRIBUTION OF INDIGENOUS LANDS TO THE CONSERVATION OF BRAZIL’S FOREST ECOSYSTEMS
